body.name: Durable Pound A Ball Toys for Toddler, Stacking, Learning, Active, Early Developmental Hammer Montessori Toys, Fun Gifts for Boy & Girl - STEM Educational Toy - Great Birthday Gift Ages 1 2 3
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 48 mins
features: FINE MOTOR PROMOTION: This Multi-color pound a ball is ideal for hammering practice, Promotes dexterity, hand eye coordination, manipulation, arm movement, cause and effect.
KID FRIENDLY: The design of hammer and balls are specially made for little hands and suitable for an easy grip. your child will love seeing the ball slide from layer to layer
EASY PLAY: The smooth-sanded balls Drop down after hammered/pounding and sends the balls rolling down the ramp out the on the bottom tray.
STIMULATING: Keep kids busy with this particular pounding ball action toy it is very helpful to grow up your infant's mind.
GREAT GIFT IDEA: This pound ball makes a perfect birthday gift for your child and their friends. They'll unwrap it at the party and play together!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hours of fun and tons of learning Keep kids busy with this particular pounding ball action toy it is very helpful to grow up your infant's mind and promote fine motor skills such as dexterity, hand-eye coordination, manipulation, arm movements, cause, and effect.

Why choose Playkidiz Toys: Perfect Size for Little Hands Our engineering dept. worked very hard to make sure that the pound a Ball is the perfect size that will work well for most babies, with a height of 10" and width of 10" and length of 12" you are in perfect shape! Sturdy Quality Playkidiz philosophy is to have toys that last, our Pound-A-Ball That is very Sturdy as stated within the testimonials of customers - see for yourself , try it - feel it. Your Baby will play with this for months and you can safely put it away for the next child. Safety First Playkidiz only makes toys that are 100% Safe for your kid - Serious Design and Thought went into the manufacturing to make sure that every angle, every edge is smooth for your baby to play with safely and fun.

SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT: Toys are vital tools that help foster the mental, physical, emotional and social development of boys and girls. Toys are basic instruments for the development of children. It is fun for children to pound the balls until they drop in the block and slide out. There are four balls, yellow, red, blue and green it improves the hand-eye coordination, aligning, slotting and aiming. Pound the colorful balls with the squeaky hammer and watch them drop through the maze. It is specially designed for easy gripping. Recommended for ages 12 months and up. INSPIRE: Playkidz Toys inspires learning! Our products not only inspire children to learn, they inspire parents and educators to teach and learn. ABOUT PLAYKIDZ: Better Products, Better Parenting. Play Toys specializes in premium quality, kid-powered learning products for newborns through school aged children. Best in class, PLAYKIDZ Toys combines multiple levels of learning in every toy with safety and quality standards beyond the national standards. A unique play experience into each of our products, an experience that stimulates multiple centers in the brain simultaneously, an experience that promotes both critical thinking and open-ended imaginary play. WHY ARE EDUCATIONAL TOYS IMPORTANT? Children need to have direct experience with the world in order to make sense of and learn about it. Have you ever thought about all the things children learn after they are born? They learn how to talk, sit up, walk, and run. They learn what things are and how they work. They learn about people and the world. They learn all of these things by playing with toys. Toys encourages children to use their imagination and allows them to gain self-confidence. As they play with a toy, they develop a sense of power when they complete a task. Look, mom, I can do this. It is important we recognize this accomplishment and applaud them for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy, very durable and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: My son loves it! He’s a little rough with his toys and this stands up to that. Easy enough for him to use but still challenging. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lives Up to the Reviews
reviews.reviewText: My grandson is one and he’s enjoying this. He started by feeding the balls partway through the channels with his hands and is now pushing them through the holes on top. We’ll give him the hammer next. It’s a good toy that is a bit mesmerizing but quiet/ non electronic. Works well in a multi generational family environment like Thanksgiving and Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought these for 2 of our grandsons - 18 months and 13 months. Both boys love this and can stay occupied for 20-39 minutes. Good toy for eye-hand coordination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for a younger toddler
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for our two year old grandson and it is a little too young for him. He played with it when he first opened it but now he ignores it. It would be great for littles under 18 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my grandson. He plays with this all the time and it’s holding up great! Good quality and easy for him to use. Comes with a little hammer. So cute. Love love love. Will buy again. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made toy!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a well made toy that will take toddler abuse & last!!It is a little expensive, but good quality!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time I bought this and this is a new model. Easy to use and babies really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son and daughter loves it !
reviews.reviewText: My kids love this toy, great for my son occupational therapy, color matching & keeping them busy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: bought this as a present. Keeping children busy for quite long time

The media could not be loaded. Gekauft als „Warehouse Deal“ für 16 Eur. Als Zustand wurde „sehr gut“ angegeben. Allerdings war es fast neu mit Verpackung. Also fast 15 EUR gespart :)Das Spielzeug ist 2 in 1: Hammerspiel und Kugelbahn. Unsere Tochter spielt sehr gerne damit. Sie war 1 Jahr alt, als wir es ihr zum Geburtstag geschenkt haben. Die Qualität ist sehr gut.Die Bilder sind nach 3 Monaten Kaufdatum. Ich kann es nur empfehlen.
En av de bästa leksaker jag köpt till min 18 månaders tjej 👌👌🤩🤩

reviews.reviewTitle: gioco divertente a attraente per bimbi (già utilizzabile a 2 anni//2 anni e mezzo...)
reviews.reviewText: robusto, simpatico e attrattivo, i bimbi di 2 anni e mezzo con facilità lo usano in autonomia , forse quelli di 2 anni andrebbero aiutati ma si divertirebbero, lo consiglio
